goals.head: goals
goals.content: Further developing front-end and javascript abilities. Improving insight in algorithms and data structures. In the longer term advancing knowledge of the functional programming paradigm.

hobbies.head: hobbies
hobbies.selfLearningSub: Data Science and Deep Learning specializations at Coursera

deloitte.entry: Developing an application for international banks allowing for compliance with IFRS9. The application based on a Shiny reactive library, Bootstrap, jQuery, MSSQL, dockerized Linux. Assessing, implementing and validating models. Code and model documentation. Resolving issues in UAT.<hr class="line-break"/>Own initiatives:<hr class="line-break"/>Written from scratch E2E testing in JS based on Protractor and Selenium. Refactor of database connection code to accommodate Oracle DB to meet the needs of a new client.

waruniversity.name:
Warsaw
University
waruniversity.entry: Assistant of professor Micha≈Ç Krawczyk. Preparation and analysis of data for research in behavioral economics regarding decision-making under risk. Searching for and summarizing related papers. Translation of research papers. Conducting experiment sessions with participants. Preparing and submitting grant proposals.

waruniversity.name:
Warsaw
University
waruniversity.entry: Recipient of Dean's scholarship awarded to the top 5% of students. Participant of elite individual course of studies offered to the top 7% of students. Extended the standard program by additional classes in computer science and statistics. Studies in English.

erum.name: eRum
erum.entry: Attendee. Partaken in workshops about graph databases, R package creation and in conference lectures.

accenture.name: Accenture
accenture.entry:
Data-driven BI case study competition about problems of a fictional bank with a goal of finding them and proposing solutions.
Finished with team and individual distinctions for analytical capabilities.

daftcode.name: DaftCode
daftcode.entry: Credit card fraud detection based on anonymized data using Python stack with xgboost and scikit learn.
